project.name: Flowman root pom
project.description: Flowman is a Big Data build tool powered by Apache Spark. It simplified the development of complex data transformations by employing a purely declarative workflow. Moreover, Flowman can also take over the complete lifecycle management of outgoing data sinks, let them be Hive tables, JDBC tables or simply files. This lifecycle management includes table creation, automatic migration, populating and optional clean up.
